mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE,'RRRRMM')) FROM MEMBER GROUP BY TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE,'RRRRMM') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE,'RRRRMM') ASC
SELECT TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE,'RRRRMM') FROM MEMBER GROUP BY TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE,'RRRRMM') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE,'RRRRMM') ASC
SELECT M.MNO, M.EMAIL, M.PHONE, M.BIRTHDAY, M.NICNAME,(SELECT SUM (P.AMOUNT) FROM PAYMENT P GROUP BY P.MNO HAVING P.MNO = M.MNO) AS TOTAL_AMOUNT FROM MEMBER M

SELECT M.NM_TITLE, (SELECT E.EMAIL FROM MARU_MEMBER R JOIN MEMBER E ON (R.MNO = E.MNO) WHERE M.NMNO = R.NMNO AND R.CON_LEVEL = 0)AS MARUADMIN,(SELECT COUNT (*) FROM MARU_MEMBER MM GROUP BY MM.NMNO HAVING MM.NMNO = M.NMNO)AS MARUMAEMBER FROM NARUMARU M WHERE M.NM_CATEGORY = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NARUMARU WHERE NM_CATEGORY = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE ENROLL_DATE LIKE SYSDATE
SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(AMOUNT) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE SUM(AMOUNT) END FROM PAYMENT WHERE PAYDAY LIKE SYSDATE
SELECT M.EMAIL, M.NICNAME, P.PAYDAY, P.AMOUNT, P.POINT FROM MEMBER M JOIN PAYMENT P ON (M.MNO = P.MNO)

SELECT SUM(AMOUNT) FROM MEMBER M JOIN PAYMENT P ON(M.MNO = P.MNO) GROUP BY SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, BIRTHDAY)/12)), 0, 1) ORDER BY SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, BIRTHDAY)/12)), 0, 1) ASC
